structure.unit: ARTICLE CIV. STONEGATE COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT DISTRICT

law.catch_line: No district bonds or debts to constitute debts or obligations of the county.

text.section: No bond, debt or other obligation of the Stonegate Community Development District, nor any default thereon, shall constitute a debt or obligation of Miami-Dade County, except upon the express approval and agreement of the Miami-Dade Board of County Commissioners.
